results.content:
Why is the packaging so extreme with this series? The intro plays dramatic orchestra music at top volume, then shows a starfield going into warp drive. Then the outro is a figure triumphantly scaling a mountain. It's way too much, super annoying.

The instructor and the videos themselves are actually great. Calm, clear, detailed. Thanks for making this series. Just please ask the good people doing promo at Mammoth to chill the f out.

results.content: The intron and ending is unnecessary and too loud. The course is very repetitive put that's fine, I can advance forward as I need. Better to be too thorough than not enough.

results.content:
This guy knows his stuff.  Really good course.

Has a ton of content!  I watch this all the time.  His SVG knowledge is impressive.  I also liked the React stuff. 

Again, there is a ton of stuff in this course.  Bypass the other ones, just buy this.  Do I have to watch the intro every time though?   lol
